title: /Remake is highly abused
body: So let me get this straight... if I don't select or ban a champ, I get a penalty. If I am there for champ select and bans then decide we aren't doing good because they get first blood I can AFK for 90 seconds and get a remake and waste the other team's time with no penalty? Cool beans.

replies.body:
If you start moving then they get First Blood and then go AFK, I don't think the system will let you Remake.

If you want to try it and get flagged by Leave buster and take a loss for the sake of your random teammates, be my guest.

You have to not be moving at the start of the match so its not actually all that abuseable

> [{quoted}](name=OtterlyLost,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JeEapjlL,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-11T20:26:21.660+0000)
>
> You have to not be moving at the start of the match so its not actually all that abuseable

actually you cant even successfully connect/load into the match. Once all players make it past the loading screen remakes are no longer possible. 

Even if the AFK player connects at 00:01 and disconnects to never return for the rest of the match by 00:02 you still wont be able to remake.

> [{quoted}](name=Nevurwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JeEapjlL,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2018-07-11T20:56:25.664+0000)

Nope. There's are time I forget to tab in after load screen and got remake. I was fully connected for the whole time.

Also, I had a game where a darling took the wrong summoners so he told us he'd afk so we can remake in game chat. He did and we got a remake. I wanted to honor him so much.

well i dont know how it is on your pc, but on mine, if i Alt+tab at the very start of the load screen and leave it as such, my game does not load at all until i tab back into it. So if its the same, you actually arent connecting while you are alt+tabbed.

Basically if i alt tab and dont show till 3 minutes later, my team has the option to remake cause i never loaded to 100% in the load screen. But if i let it load, then alt+tab, my team cant remake because i connected.

Your PC may treat the load screen differently, but that's how mine operates with the client.

The person who AFKed gets a loss and a leavebuster strike.

At that point any semi-competitive game is an autloss anyway.
I believe it's an automatic loss for the inactive player who was the cause of the remake. As well as get flagged by leavebuster as if you left.

so basically we can go for a risky invade and have someone sit in base AFK for 90 seconds JUST INCASE it doesn't go as planned then we get to remake? Cool!!!!!!!!!!
You'd have to find someone who was willing to eat all of those punishments for the sake of random people.

You really have no fucking clue how anything works. Fucking clueless. You can't remake if everyone is actually connected when First Blood happens

There is a penalty you twit. If you are the afk you lose LP like it was a loss. If ***you were even queued*** with the person who was afk, you still lose LP like its a loss. You both then get leaver buster as well
